pullRequest.title: Issue #9133: AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters should support '\s' escape symbol

beforeCommit.message: Issue #9133: AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters should support escaped s

afterCommit.message: Issue #9133: AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters should support escaped s

nodes.bodyText: // violation comments should be on lines 19 and 25, where violation is reported
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+//non-compiled with javac: Compilable with Java14
+package com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.checks.avoidescapedunicodecharacters;
+
+/* Config:
+ *
+ * allowEscapesForControlCharacters = false
+ * allowByTailComment = false
+ * allowIfAllCharactersEscaped = true
+ * allowNonPrintableEscapes = false
+ */
+public class InputAvoidEscapedUnicodeCharactersEscapedS {
+    String value1 = "\u03bc\t"; // ok
+    String value2 = "\u03bc\s"; // ok
+    String value3 = "\u03bc\s not all escaped chars"; // violation
+    String value31 = "\u03bc\n not all escaped chars"; // violation
+    String value4 = """
+            \s\s\s\n
+            """; // ok
+    String value5 = """
+            \u03bc\s
+            """; // ok
+    String value6 = """
+            \s\s\s\n not all escaped chars
+            """; // violation
+    String value7 = """
+            \u03bc\s not all escaped chars
+            """; // violation

nodes.bodyText: I think we should move this text to PR description. This comment is hard to understand

Please change the link to https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se15/html/jls-3.html#jls-3.10.7


All patterns in this file seems to be sorted. It is better to place \s between \r and \t


The docs says there is one more escape - for a trailing \. Something like \\$.
For example


    static final String value1 = """
        \u03bc\
        \s\u03bc\
        """; // ok
is just μ μ. Please create a new issue for this.

nodes.bodyText:
Confirm Issue #9159 represents this fix. I will approve that issue and you should split this PR into 2 commits, 1 for new functionality and 1 for a bug fix. Then we can merge it since others have all approved this.
This is so the bug fix doesn't get lost in the release notes as they should go under different items.
